statements: SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = True;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE reward_given = False;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_achievements;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM player_achievements;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 3 AND milestone_reached = True;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT achievement_id, SUM(achievement_id) AS total_points FROM player_achievements GROUP BY achievement_id;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%level%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT achievement_id) FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = True GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 2;
SELECT player_id, AVG(achievement_id) AS average_points FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(achievement_id) AS max_points FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements ORDER BY player_id ASC, achievement_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = True OR reward_given = True;
SELECT player_id, MIN(achievement_id) AS min_points, MAX(achievement_id) AS max_points FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 4 AND (milestone_reached = True OR reward_given = True);
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = TRUE AND reward_given = FALSE;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT achievement_id) AS unique_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(CAST(milestone_reached AS INT)) AS total_milestones_reached FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT achievement_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_achievements GROUP BY achievement_name;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, milestone_reached, reward_given FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name, milestone_reached, reward_given FROM player_achievements ORDER BY player_id ASC, achievement_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%Gold%';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, reward_given FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%Diamond%' AND milestone_reached = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT achievement_id, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name = 'Climber' GROUP BY achievement_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name = 'Explorer');
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, milestone_reached FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_id IN (SELECT achievement_id FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2);
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = TRUE AND reward_given = FALSE ORDER BY player_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, reward_given FROM player_achievements WHERE milestone_reached = TRUE AND (player_id = 1 OR player_id = 2);
SELECT player_id, SUM(CAST(reward_given AS INT)) AS total_rewards_given FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_rewards_given > 0;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, reward_given FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 3 AND reward_given = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT achievement_id FROM player_achievements);
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 4 AND milestone_reached = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT * FROM InGameRewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_description, reward_points FROM InGameRewards;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(achievement_date) FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT reward_id, SUM(reward_points) FROM InGameRewards GROUP BY reward_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements ORDER BY player_id ASC, achievement_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(achievement_id) > 5;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 2 AND achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, achievement_id FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_id NOT IN (4, 5, 6);
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 3 AND achievement_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT achievement_id) FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements OFFSET 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT * FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT PlayerAchievements.player_id, InGameRewards.reward_description FROM PlayerAchievements JOIN InGameRewards ON PlayerAchievements.achievement_id = InGameRewards.reward_id;

SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM PlayerAchievements JOIN InGameRewards ON PlayerAchievements.achievement_id = InGameRewards.reward_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MIN(achievement_date) AS first_achievement_date, MAX(achievement_date) AS latest_achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id, achievement_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT achievement_id) AS unique_achievements FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id FROM PlayerAchievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

SELECT PlayerAchievements.player_id, AVG(reward_points) AS avg_points FROM PlayerAchievements JOIN InGameRewards ON PlayerAchievements.achievement_id = InGameRewards.reward_id GROUP BY PlayerAchievements.player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM PlayerAchievements JOIN InGameRewards ON PlayerAchievements.achievement_id = InGameRewards.reward_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_points > 100;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, achievement_date) AS days_since_achievement FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, STRFTIME('%Y', achievement_date) AS achievement_year FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, YEAR(achievement_date) AS achievement_year FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, MONTH(achievement_date) AS achievement_month FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, DAY(achievement_date) AS achievement_day FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, HOUR(achievement_date) AS achievement_hour FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, MINUTE(achievement_date) AS achievement_minute FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, SECOND(achievement_date) AS achievement_second FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE level > 5;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT achievement_name, points FROM achievements WHERE points >= 100;
SELECT * FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achieved_date FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level >= 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_players FROM player;
SELECT MAX(points) as max_points FROM achievements;
SELECT MIN(points) as min_points FROM achievements;
SELECT AVG(points) as avg_points FROM achievements;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) as total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;

SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(points) as total_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(*) as total_achievements FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;

SELECT player_id, player_name, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), achieved_date) as days_since_achievement FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), achieved_date) < 30;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE YEAR(achieved_date) = YEAR(CURDATE());
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT achievement_id) as unique_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, MIN(achieved_date) as first_achievement_date FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id, achievement_id;

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level > 10

SELECT player.player_name, player.level, achievements.achievement_name, achievements.points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE achievements.points >= 100

SELECT player.player_name, player.level, achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level < 5

SELECT player.player_name, player.level, achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE achievements.points BETWEEN 50 AND 100

SELECT player.player_name, SUM(achievements.points) AS total_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(player_achievements.achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player.player_name HAVING total_achievements > 5

SELECT player.player_name, AVG(achievements.points) AS average_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level IN (5, 10, 15)

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level = 20

SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT player_achievements.achievement_id) AS total_unique_achievements FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY player.player_name HAVING total_unique_achievements > 3

SELECT player.player_name, SUM(achievements.points) AS total_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE achievements.points > 50 GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(DISTINCT achievements.achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level < 10 GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT achievements.achievement_name, COUNT(player_achievements.player_id) AS total_players FROM achievements JOIN player_achievements ON achievements.achievement_id = player_achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY achievements.achievement_name HAVING total_players > 5

SELECT player.player_name, MAX(achievements.points) AS highest_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, MIN(achievements.points) AS lowest_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, COUNT(achievements.points) AS total_achievements_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level > 15 GROUP BY player.player_name

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level < 5 AND achievements.points > 50

SELECT player.player_name, AVG(achievements.points) AS average_points FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level IN (10, 20)

SELECT player.player_name, achievements.achievement_name, player_achievements.achieved_date FROM player JOIN player_achievements ON player.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE player.level = 10 AND achievements.points < 50
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT id, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE milestone_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_type FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'item';
SELECT * FROM player_rewards;
SELECT player_id, reward_id, reward_date FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, reward_id, reward_date FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE milestone_name LIKE '%complete%';
SELECT id, reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value > 100;
SELECT id, player_id, reward_id, reward_date FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = 3 AND reward_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM player_rewards GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward_value FROM rewards;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward_value FROM player_rewards JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, reward_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM player_rewards GROUP BY player_id, reward_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(reward_value) AS avg_reward_value FROM rewards;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id, achievement_name;

SELECT p.player_id, a.achievement_name FROM achievements AS a INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON a.player_id = pr.player_id AND a.id = pr.reward_id JOIN players AS p ON a.player_id = p.id WHERE pr.reward_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM milestones GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT r.reward_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY r.reward_name;
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE player_id = 2 AND milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT pr.player_id, r.reward_name, r.reward_type FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id WHERE pr.reward_date < '2022-04-15';
SELECT player_id, MAX(achievement_date) AS latest_achievement_date FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(reward_value) AS avg_reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(pr.reward_id) > 3;

SELECT p.player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id JOIN players AS p ON pr.player_id = p.id GROUP BY p.player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT player_id, reward_name, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY player_id, reward_name;
SELECT player_id, AVG(reward_value) AS avg_reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING MAX(reward_value) > 100;

SELECT p.player_id, r.reward_name, r.reward_type, pr.reward_date FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id JOIN players AS p ON pr.player_id = p.id WHERE pr.reward_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM player_rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING SUM(reward_value) > 500;
SELECT player_id, MAX(milestone_date) AS latest_milestone_date FROM milestones GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT p.player_id, r.reward_name, r.reward_value FROM rewards AS r INNER JOIN player_rewards AS pr ON r.id = pr.reward_id JOIN players AS p ON pr.player_id = p.id WHERE r.reward_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT * FROM milestones;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_amount FROM rewards;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT * FROM player_rewards;
SELECT player_id, reward_date FROM player_rewards;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT reward_name, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_id = 4;
SELECT player_id, reward_date FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achieved_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM milestones WHERE milestone_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level = 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience > 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements JOIN players ON achievements.player_id = players.player_id;
SELECT player_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones JOIN players ON milestones.player_id = players.player_id;
SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_amount FROM rewards JOIN players ON rewards.player_id = players.player_id WHERE reward_amount > 50;
SELECT player_name, player_level, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM players JOIN milestones ON players.player_id = milestones.player_id WHERE player_level > 5;

SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_amount FROM player_rewards JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id JOIN players ON player_rewards.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_name = 'John';

SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_amount FROM rewards JOIN player_rewards ON rewards.reward_id = player_rewards.reward_id JOIN players ON player_rewards.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_level < 5;

SELECT player_name, player_level, reward_name, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE reward_amount BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice';

SELECT player_name, player_level, reward_name, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE player_level > 3 AND reward_amount < 30;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Bob';

SELECT player_name, player_level, reward_name, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE player_level < 5 OR reward_amount > 50;
SELECT player_name, player_level, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Emma';
SELECT player_name, player_level, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM players JOIN milestones ON players.player_id = milestones.player_id WHERE player_level = 10;

SELECT player_name, player_level, reward_name, reward_amount FROM players JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id JOIN rewards ON player_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM players JOIN milestones ON players.player_id = milestones.player_id WHERE player_name = 'David';
